Hotel rooms

Super deluxe

The Super Deluxe Room at the Peppers Waymouth Adelaide is one of the best accommodations the hotel has to offer. Highly rated and located in the newest part of the hotel, these rooms provide unparalleled comfort and chic.

The stylish and modern design of the Super Deluxe room impresses with its elegance. Attention to detail and the use of high quality materials create a luxurious atmosphere. The spaciousness of the room allows you to feel real comfort, and stylish furniture adds charm.

The Super Deluxe Room is equipped with all the modern amenities a guest would expect from a first class hotel. A large bed with soft bedding and pillows ensures a top-notch night's rest. It also includes a minibar, flat-screen TV, work desk and free Wi-Fi.

Family apartment

The family rooms at the Peppers Waymouth Adelaide are also highly rated and are considered among the best in the hotel. They are new and modern, offering the highest level of comfort for family travelers.

These rooms feature spacious bedrooms and living areas that can be separated from each other to ensure privacy for all family members. Every detail in the family rooms is designed with the comfort of your home in mind, including comfortable beds, modern interiors and great views of the surrounding city.

Family room guests also have access to all hotel facilities, including restaurants, bars and spa. These rooms are excellent options for families who want to enjoy a wonderful holiday in elegant and comfortable surroundings. If you are looking for a high standard family room with a new look, the family rooms at the Peppers Waymouth Adelaide are a great choice for your stay in Adelaide.

Family Suite

The family suites at the Peppers Waymouth Adelaide deserve a high rating and are considered among the best in the hotel. They are new and recently refurbished, with state of the art amenities and stylish design.

These family suites pay special attention to comfort and spaciousness. They offer a separate bedroom for parents and separate sleeping areas for children or other family members, providing you with a private environment and a unique vacation.

Family suites offer luxurious interiors, contemporary furnishings and great city views. They are equipped with everything you need for your comfort, including comfortable beds, spacious living areas and fully equipped kitchens so you can prepare family meals or breakfasts.
